name: Asteroid Calamity
description:
It's the year 2040, and the Von Braun Space Station needs some more food, so SnackX sent two cargo probes to the Station to restock the food, seems easy, one problem, there are also asteroids flying around. Good Luck!

It will take 30 seconds to reach the station.

Notes: This game is pretty hard.

Built for Lost Relics Game Jam 2022. Theme: Connection
